title: was able to play ranked now i cant?
body:
this is for my 2nd account which is level 33, the past 2 days i started playing ranked on that account, with no problems. 
i guess it was counting the free champion rotation champions so i met the "30 champion requirement" now all of a sudden the free rotation champions dont count and im no longer allowed to play ranked games because i dont have 30 champions unlocked?? hello? why was i allowed to play at first but not now?

replies.body:
https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/Tkgoyb08-f2p-champions-in-ranked
Looks like there was a temporary bug with free rotation. They accidentally counted for the required 20 truly owned champs to enter ranked. You shouldnt have been able to play ranked in the last hours. I guess they fixed the bug and you cant play ranked anymore until you have personally unlocked 20 champions.

Probably because the free champions and your smaller pool are overlapping.

**Ex.** You own 20 champions.

 First rotation, 10 of the champions are unique to your account so you have 30 in total.

 Next rotation comes around, one of the champions from the rotation is also one you already own, so now you have 29 in total.
yea but the free rotation hasn't changed between earlier today and now. so it still makes no sense how i was able to play earlier and now i cant.
Huh. In that case yeah, it might be a bug. File a ticket I guess? That or buy all the 450/1350 champs
